ZBBOUsr;:. ,,,rHgZPUaSaUSUSSXaUPXsSBB6ZZp6EEGOOGDEggO ;BBQQZaSJ5J15SJDQ7 .iEBL:. . .,:,:;SRQGZXPXXSHaS2UUSUSswQB6OZgG6pZZGODEOGDE JgUri1aGEpEpXSS5LBQ, .rLap2Jr ;712OO6ZggRDZXHXpKK2211LLLc7wgBa2PODRGE6OZgDgGDGD 7QB; ,Jc76DaZXOZgDPEBBX, :c1HEZ1c;:,.,:;cHDgQQggMZgGOZO6OEGpXsLLsJXHPOBBBc;vss5EMggZDODOgED6 LZJ::iwrrr72EPgXU5OBBBBBBBp7: .i5P6wL;, .:LS6DMgMgZKgEOPOGGDDGEXULvLSOBBBBBQBgDQDJ5rrr7JOQQDDZGEgDD wp rR5, .HQRX7r72RQBBBBBQBMEK6Uc7sc7cHOU:, .:LHgOQg6ZOPZpZGGEDERZPwcr7LKDDaJr:. rBX;;:r:ir1DBQMgRgDp 7D,sw: , Z. .LgBBQBBOsJaQBBBBBBXrr. .:rwZBBQgROgDgDOERRMgROOScrLsPP5r, 7Qs,::::::rUgRgZOG6 ,Q57:r ,: ,r U: .;; .vL7L;r:UG7.:sr;JSgQBgDEZXXUSXpHa21svr7r7s2v:. iQK...:,:::;LLJJws OBHs;. :;;,v H: :6X; rpL;7pSrrr7r;::,....,,:;iirrvvvr, :BBPs;;:,,,,::;:: ::rPDEL:..7:c;7r pK .: :KL.:r:.. ..:icsS5sr:,. JgGgBQDOSJss77r :r;::: , PH r, ,;5: ,::::;7Ls7Lc7;: ,:7JP17rJUs .:J: :; .,:K6BQS7:.,.,. :r7Ji;r7;::;;. . **/#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;#define FFI(a, b) for(int i = a; i < b; i++)#define FFJ(a, b) for(int j = a; j < b; j++)#define FFK(a, b) for(int k = a; k < b; k++)#define RR(a, b) for(int i = a; i > b; i++)#define ME(a, b) memset(a, b, sizeof(a))#define FILL(a, b, c) fill(a, a + b, c)#define SC(x) scanf("%d", &x)#define SCC(a, b) scanf("%d%d", &a, &b)#define PR(x) printf("%d\n", x)#define PRR(a, b) printf("%d%d\n", a, b);#define INF 0x3f3f3f3f#define MAX 12#define MOD 1000000007#define E 2.71828182845#define M 8#define N 6typedef long long LL;const double PI = acos(-1.0);typedef pair<int, int> Author;vector<pair<string, int> > VP;/*******************************************************************************************************************************************************/int main(void){ #ifdef Empirefree freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin); freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout); #endif ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(0); cout.tie(0); int T, len, k, index, fac[MAX], num[MAX], ans;string str; fac[0] = fac[1] = 1; FFI(2, MAX) fac[i] = fac[i - 1] * i; cin>>T; while(T--){ cin>>str;ans = 0;ME(num, 0);index = MAX; //康拓公式 FFI(0, MAX){ k = 0; FFJ(i + 1, MAX)if(str[i] > str[j]) k++; num[--index] = k; } for(int i = MAX - 1; i > 0; i--) ans += num[i] * fac[i]; cout<<ans + 1<<endl; } return EXIT_SUCCESS;}

entry.title: VF
entry.content:
以人为镜，可以明得失传送门 题目意思是前n位数和为s的数的个数有多少个，想到不能直接枚举，故利用DP求解 DP[i][j] 前i位的和为j的个数（即答案）有多少个.[1 <= i <= 10; 1 <= j <= 81] 利用k控制每i位加上k，但k要 < 10 且目前所有位的和j要 >= k 最重要的即DP[i][j] += DP[i - 1][j - k];即控制当前位的数大小变化时，满足其个数是前一位的j - k变化的大小（举个例子，i = 2,j = 18即是99,DP[2][18] = 1;）(注意: 这里是DP[][]是当前位的数，要想求所有的数，需要sum +=DP[][]，具体看代码) 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123/** :;LaEaHKEEGpPXU7;, .:75pKH11252U252XapZgRQgD6XJscLr;,. :LXpRgGaX521JLw1JswJJsJs22XHPPEZEGDOMMRDOa7. .r2EDDZEpZPZP6KpHX5SXH5XXa5KwaXaSX5UJ1c77sLs2GMQQ6r . ,LpgOGpEZGZEZEpZKpHHU5wP5HEDgpXpHa2SSa5aSXULr7rrirrJXRBp; ;B ,J6MRZH6EgEEZE6E6EZZPZXXwSSGQXr::aPpP5USUHaHaKa5Lvrr7ri;rLHBB2: Kc rpQDOpPPOGGZOGOZG6GEOEOEDPPGBa. .PaSSUXSUUUaUSaKXKS177r7rrrirSBBR7 .O, :UBQOKPK6ZOOOEDEO6GZE6EpEpDgDBR: UBpXHa5aSaUS5SUS5XapPHJc7rrv7rr7sgBBs .g. ;gBMPXpO6GEOEOEOEGEOEE6EZEEDRGBB EB5pKSXpHKaHSX552S5aUHHEX17c7vr7777s5RBS: .R; .sQBPXpDZOODOgODGOGgEDEOEOGgGgOOMB: LBKKSXSHa52aaKXHXKaa5aSaaHXSJLcL7vcc777JDBBg2;. ", sum); } } return EXIT_SUCCESS;}

", x)#define PRR(a, b) printf("%d%d
", a, b);#define INF 0x3f3f3f3f#define MAX 1001#define MOD 1000000007#define E 2.71828182845#define M 8#define N 6typedef long long LL;const double PI = acos(-1.0);typedef pair<int, int> Author;vector<pair<string, int> > VP;/*******************************************************************************************************************************************************/struct Node{int x;int y;}point[MAX];int cmp(const Node& a, const Node& b){return a.x < b.x;}int up[MAX], down[MAX];int main(void){// #ifdef Empirefree// freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);// freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);// #endif//// ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(nullptr); cout.tie(nullptr);int T, n;cin>>T;while(T--){ cin>>n; FFI(0, n){ cin>>point[i].x>>point[i].y; up[i] = 1; down[i] = 1; } sort(point, point + n, cmp);for(int i = n - 2; i >= 0; i--) for(int j = i + 1; j < n; j++){ if(point[j].y > point[i].y) up[i] = max(up[i], up[j] + 1); if(point[j].y < point[i].y) down[i] = max(down[i], down[j] + 1); }cout<<max(*max_element(up, up + n), *max_element(down, down + n))<<endl;}return EXIT_SUCCESS;} 1.2 时间复杂度nlog(n),代码较长，且用到了指针 ** :;LaEaHKEEGpPXU7;, .:75pKH11252U252XapZgRQgD6XJscLr;,. :LXpRgGaX521JLw1JswJJsJs22XHPPEZEGDOMMRDOa7. .r2EDDZEpZPZP6KpHX5SXH5XXa5KwaXaSX5UJ1c77sLs2GMQQ6r . ,LpgOGpEZGZEZEpZKpHHU5wP5HEDgpXpHa2SSa5aSXULr7rrirrJXRBp; ;B ,J6MRZH6EgEEZE6E6EZZPZXXwSSGQXr::aPpP5USUHaHaKa5Lvrr7ri;rLHBB2: Kc rpQDOpPPOGGZOGOZG6GEOEOEDPPGBa. .PaSSUXSUUUaUSaKXKS177r7rrrirSBBR7 .O, :UBQOKPK6ZOOOEDEO6GZE6EpEpDgDBR: UBpXHa5aSaUS5SUS5XapPHJc7rrv7rr7sgBBs .g. ;gBMPXpO6GEOEOEOEGEOEE6EZEEDRGBB EB5pKSXpHKaHSX552S5aUHHEX17c7vr7777s5RBS: .R; .sQBPXpDZOODOgODGOGgEDEOEOGgGgOOMB: LBKKSXSHa52aaKXHXKaa5aSaaHXSJLcL7vcc777JDBBg2;. JgGgBQDOSJss77r :r;::: , PH r, ,;5: ,::::;7Ls7Lc7;: ,:7JP17rJUs .:J: :; .,:K6BQS7:.,.,. :r7Ji;r7;::;;. . **/#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;#define FFI(a, b) for(int i = a; i < b; i++)#define FFJ(a, b) for(int j = a; j < b; j++)#define RR(a, b) for(int i = a; i > b; i++)#define ME(a, b) memset(a, b, sizeof(a))#define SC(x) scanf("%d", &x)#define SCC(a, b) scanf("%d%d", &a, &b)#define PR(x) printf("%d
", x)#define PRR(a, b) printf("%d%d
", a, b);#define INF 0x3f3f3f3f#define MAX 10001#define MOD 1000000007#define E 2.71828182845#define M 8#define N 6typedef long long LL;const double PI = acos(-1.0);typedef pair<int, int> Author;vector<pair<string, int> > VP;LL qkm(LL a, LL b, LL c){ LL res = 1; for(a %= c; b; b >>= 1, a = a * a % c) if(b & 1) res = res * a % c; return res;}inline int max(int a, int b){return a > b ? a : b;}inline int min(int a, int b){return a > b ? b : a;}// {copy(selected,selected+N,ostream_iterator<int>(cout,""));cout<<endl;return;}整型输出/***********************************************************************************************************************************///白书和蓝书和小红书//平时不多思考，就是这么菜int x, y[MAX], up[MAX], down[MAX];int main(void){// #ifdef Empirefree// freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);// freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);// #endif// ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(0);cout.tie(0); int T, n, length, top1, top2; cin>>T; while(T--){ cin>>n;ME(y, 0);ME(up, 0);ME(down, 0);top1 = top2 = 0; FFI(0, n){ cin>>x; cin>>y[x - 1]; //x从1开始 } length = remove(y, y + MAX, 0) - y; FFI(0, length){ int *p = lower_bound(up, up + top1, y[i]); int *q = lower_bound(down, down + top2, y[i], greater<int>()); if(p - up == top1) top1++; if(q - down == top2) top2++; *p = y[i]; *q = y[i]; } cout<<max(top1, top2)<<endl; } return EXIT_SUCCESS;} 这个方法是真的很强，remove()将散列序列集合到y[]中，但是感觉空间上并不是很好，然后就是lower_bound单纯二分搜索了，下面给出一个代码长度短一点了,毕竟这个都用到了指针了 1.3 时间复杂度nlog(n),简单代码 ** :;LaEaHKEEGpPXU7;, .:75pKH11252U252XapZgRQgD6XJscLr;,. :LXpRgGaX521JLw1JswJJsJs22XHPPEZEGDOMMRDOa7. .r2EDDZEpZPZP6KpHX5SXH5XXa5KwaXaSX5UJ1c77sLs2GMQQ6r . ,LpgOGpEZGZEZEpZKpHHU5wP5HEDgpXpHa2SSa5aSXULr7rrirrJXRBp; ;B ,J6MRZH6EgEEZE6E6EZZPZXXwSSGQXr::aPpP5USUHaHaKa5Lvrr7ri;rLHBB2: Kc rpQDOpPPOGGZOGOZG6GEOEOEDPPGBa. .PaSSUXSUUUaUSaKXKS177r7rrrirSBBR7 .O, :UBQOKPK6ZOOOEDEO6GZE6EpEpDgDBR: UBpXHa5aSaUS5SUS5XapPHJc7rrv7rr7sgBBs .g. ;gBMPXpO6GEOEOEOEGEOEE6EZEEDRGBB EB5pKSXpHKaHSX552S5aUHHEX17c7vr7777s5RBS: .R; .sQBPXpDZOODOgODGOGgEDEOEOGgGgOOMB: LBKKSXSHa52aaKXHXKaa5aSaaHXSJLcL7vcc777JDBBg2;. ", a, b);#define INF 0x3f3f3f3f#define MAX 10001#define MOD 1000000007#define E 2.71828182845#define M 8#define N 6typedef long long LL;const double PI = acos(-1.0);typedef pair<int, int> Author;vector<pair<string, int> > VP;LL qkm(LL a, LL b, LL c){ LL res = 1; for(a %= c; b; b >>= 1, a = a * a % c) if(b & 1) res = res * a % c; return res;}inline int max(int a, int b){return a > b ? a : b;}inline int min(int a, int b){return a > b ? b : a;}// {copy(selected,selected+N,ostream_iterator<int>(cout,""));cout<<endl;return;}ÕûÐÍÊä³ö/***********************************************************************************************************************************///°×ÊéºÍÀ¶ÊéºÍÐ¡ºìÊé//Æ½Ê±²»¶àË¼¿¼£¬¾ÍÊÇÕâÃ´²Ëint x, y[MAX], up[MAX], down[MAX];int main(void){// #ifdef Empirefree// freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);// freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);// #endif// ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(0);cout.tie(0); int T, n, length, top1, top2; cin>>T; while(T--){ cin>>n;ME(y, 0);ME(up, INF);ME(down, 0);top1 = top2 = 0; FFI(0, n){ cin>>x; cin>>y[x - 1]; //x´Ó1¿ªÊ¼ } length = remove(y, y + MAX, 0) - y; FFI(0, length){ *lower_bound(up, up + MAX, y[i]) = y[i]; *lower_bound(down, down + MAX, y[i], greater<int>()) = y[i]; } cout<<max(lower_bound(up, up + MAX, INF) - up, lower_bound(down, down + MAX, 0, greater<int>()) - down)<<endl; } return EXIT_SUCCESS;} 注意一下空间即可，由于nyoj用不了ios::sync_with_stdio加速，所以评测速度看起来慢，但是整体还是很快得。我自己感觉下面才是比较好的做法吧，优化了空间，缩短了代码** :;LaEaHKEEGpPXU7;, .:75pKH11252U252XapZgRQgD6XJscLr;,. :LXpRgGaX521JLw1JswJJsJs22XHPPEZEGDOMMRDOa7. .r2EDDZEpZPZP6KpHX5SXH5XXa5KwaXaSX5UJ1c77sLs2GMQQ6r . ,LpgOGpEZGZEZEpZKpHHU5wP5HEDgpXpHa2SSa5aSXULr7rrirrJXRBp; ;B ,J6MRZH6EgEEZE6E6EZZPZXXwSSGQXr::aPpP5USUHaHaKa5Lvrr7ri;rLHBB2: Kc rpQDOpPPOGGZOGOZG6GEOEOEDPPGBa. .PaSSUXSUUUaUSaKXKS177r7rrrirSBBR7 .O, :UBQOKPK6ZOOOEDEO6GZE6EpEpDgDBR: UBpXHa5aSaUS5SUS5XapPHJc7rrv7rr7sgBBs .g. ;gBMPXpO6GEOEOEOEGEOEE6EZEEDRGBB EB5pKSXpHKaHSX552S5aUHHEX17c7vr7777s5RBS: .R; .sQBPXpDZOODOgODGOGgEDEOEOGgGgOOMB: LBKKSXSHa52aaKXHXKaa5aSaaHXSJLcL7vcc777JDBBg2;. ", a, b);#define INF 0x3f3f3f3f#define MAX 1001#define MOD 1000000007#define E 2.71828182845#define M 8#define N 6typedef long long LL;const double PI = acos(-1.0);typedef pair<int, int> Author;vector<pair<string, int> > VP;/*******************************************************************************************************************************************************/struct Node{ int x; int y;}point[MAX];int cmp(const Node& a, const Node& b){ return a.x < b.x;}int up[MAX], down[MAX];int main(void){// #ifdef Empirefree// freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);// freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);// #endif//// ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(nullptr); cout.tie(nullptr); int T, n; cin>>T; while(T--){ cin>>n;ME(up, INF);ME(down, 0); FFI(0, n)cin>>point[i].x>>point[i].y; sort(point, point + n, cmp); FFI(0, n){ *lower_bound(up, up + MAX, point[i].y) = point[i].y; *lower_bound(down, down + MAX, point[i].y, greater<int>()) = point[i].y; } cout<<max(lower_bound(up, up + MAX, INF) - up, lower_bound(down, down + MAX, 0, greater<int>()) - down)<<endl; } return EXIT_SUCCESS;}
